feed.title: WeddingShare Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.4.11
entry.content:
Added

  • Added security options for Content Security Policy (CSP), X-Content-Type-Options and X-Frame-Options.
  • Added Anti-CSRF Tokens to forms.
  • Added keyboard shortcuts to viewer Esc = Close Viewer LeftArrow = Back RightArrow = Forward D = Download.
  • Added encryption using the SECURITY_ENCRYPTION_KEY, SECURITY_ENCRYPTION_SALT and SECURITY_ENCRYPTION_ITERATIONS environment variables.

Changed

  • Pulled external scripts internally to improve security.
  • Remove FlatIcon attribution from footer if using a custom logo.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.4.10...1.4.11

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.4.12
entry.content:
Added

  • Added multi-platform support for linux/amd64, linux/arm/v7 and linux/arm64/v8.
  • Added upload periods via the GALLERY_UPLOAD_PERIOD environment variable.
  • Added duplicate upload detection with GALLERY_PREVENT_DUPLICATES environment variable.
  • Added multi-factor authentication with SECURITY_2FA_RESET_TO_DEFAULT recovery option.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.4.11...1.4.12

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.4.13
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Bug fix to remove videos from the slideshow.
  • Possible fix for gallery popup issue that some users have reported.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.4.12...1.4.13

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.4.14
entry.content:
Added

  • Resize the slideshow/presentation view on resize of the page.

Changed

  • Modified the UrlHelper to better generate Urls and properly encode values.

Fixed

  • Possible fix for a media-popup positioning bug.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.4.13...1.4.14

entry.title: New release for WeddingShare: v1.4.15
entry.content:
Added

  • Added option IDENTITY_CHECK_SHOW_ON_PAGE_LOAD which can be used to disabled the identity check on page load.
  • Added option IDENTITY_CHECK_REQUIRE_IDENTITY_FOR_UPLOAD which can be used to force identity check at upload.

Changelog - https://github.com/Cirx08/WeddingShare/compare/1.4.14...1.4.15
